Vendor contributions

Commercial vendors

To cover the operating costs of the (volunteer run) NTP Pool Project we ask commercial software and device vendors to pay a small fee based on usage (typically how many clients use the service). This makes it possible to continue operating the service, for commercial vendors and open source software alike.

All funds are used to run the NTP Pool Project services.

We will get in touch via the ticketing system; or if we missed it please reply to the ticket so we can follow-up!

More information or questions? Contact ask@develooper.com.

Open Source vendors

If you distribute a NTP implementation using the pool, you must place a reference to the pool in the documentation and configuration files (or configuration screen). If your NTP implementation is a server able to serve clients, please add a note about joining the pool to encourage server operators using your software to help out.
